info.title: Simple Bookmarking
info.text: Bookmark in one click Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favorite sites.

info.title: Speedy Searching
info.text: Intelligent search Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.

info.title: Easy Sharing
info.text: Share your bookmarks Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.
